awd_titl_txt: Subcommittee on Construction and Building, National Science and Technology Council
awd_abstract_narration: 9529070  Wright  The objective of the NSTC Subcommittee on Construction and Building  is to enhance the competitiveness of U.S. industry, public safety  and environmental quality through research and development, in  cooperation with U.S. industry, labor, and academia, for  improvement of the life cycle performance of construction  facilities.      Conference/workshop is to be held to define mechanisms for the  private sector, the federal government, and building regulators to  collaborate in developing processes and products leading to  achievement of the National Construction Goals.  Private Sector R&D  Program Implementation Plan for Advanced Technologies for  Constructed Facilities will be developed.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
